business.headline: Will US Fed's rate pause derail RBI's liquidity easing plans?With the US Fed on hold, will RBI ease further? After cutting the repo rate to 6.25% last month, the first in nearly five years, markets are watching for the central bank's next move.
Infosys, TCS, HCLTech gain up to 2%: Why are IT stocks rising today?IT sector stocks showcased strong performance in early trade with the Nifty IT index surging 1.56% as of 10 am.

TVS Motor shares rise as board to consider interim dividend today. Check detailsTVS Motor shares were trading marginally higher in early trade as investors await today's board meeting to consider an interim dividend for FY25.
Ola Electric share price falls after reports of regulatory scrutiny. Details hereOla Electric shares were trading 1.49% lower at Rs 53.02 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BS) at 9:53 am.
Sensex jumps 500 points: Why stock market is rising todayBSE, NSE today: By 10:52 am, the S&P BSE Sensex was up 396.37 points at 75,845.42, while the NSE Nifty50 jumped 126.30 points to 23,033.90.
Sensex, Nifty rally in early trade as US Fed holds rates; IT stocks lead chargeThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 415.38 points to 75,864.43, while the NSE Nifty50 added 116.55 to 23,024.15 as of 9:24 am.
Ola Electric shares likely to be in focus today. Here's whyOla Electric Mobility's share price is down 38% this year, over 40% since listing, and 13% in a month.

Sensex, Nifty opening today: Will market react to US Fed interest rate decision?Sensex, Nifty today: Dalal Street is expected to react to the US Federal Reserve's decision to keep interest rates unchanged while maintaining its projection for rate cuts later this year.

Stocks to watch on March 20: Wipro, CEAT, Hyundai, Adani EnterprisesIn today's trading session, shares of Adani Enterprises, Wipro, Raymond, DMart, Trent, Hyundai Motor, NHPC, and others will be in focus due to key developments.

US Fed keeps interest rates unchanged: Key takeaways from the meetingThe Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) voted to keep interest rates unchanged, maintaining its benchmark rate in the range of 4.25-4.50%.
Ripple CEO claims US SEC to drop appeal against crypto firmRipple CEO, the company behind XRP, announced on X that the US Securities and Exchange Commission will drop its appeal against Ripple Labs.
Wall Street drifts higher ahead of Fed announcementUS stocks showed marginal gains on Wednesday morning as Wall Street waits for the Federal Reserve's announcement.

entertainment.headline: Officer on Duty on OTT: Story, cast and all we know about Kunchako Boban's filmMalayalam film Officer on Duty, featuring Kunchacko Boban, received rave reviews from critics and audiences alike.  The film is streaming on Netflix.

Where is the empathy? Actor slams Air India after father denied medical waiverActor Lisa Ray called out Air India for denying a medical waiver to her 92-year-old father despite a doctor's certificate. The airline responded, saying they would review the matter.

Ibrahim's Nadaaniyan, a 'perfect punishment' for Saif's attacker, says comedianStandup comedian Pranit More mocked Ibrahim Ali Khan's Nadaaniyan, saying Saif Ali Khan's attacker should be punished by watching it twice. He also joked about Khushi Kapoor ruining co-stars' images.

Adolescence review: A nightmarish show so brilliant, it haunts youReleased-Fri Mar 14, 2025'Adolescence' is set in a UK town and yet the story doesn't feel distant, unlikely or alien. The new Netflix miniseries is here to stay with its heart-wrenching and mind-numbingly honest performances and narrative.

L2 Empuraan trailer: Mohanlal rises again as saviour in Prithviraj's explosive dramaThe much-awaited trailer of director Prithviraj Sukumaran's L2: Empuraan was released in the early hours of March 20. The under four-minute trailer highlights Mohanlal's return as the saviour.

Salman Khan's Sikandar skips Friday, set for a rare Sunday release like Tiger 3Salman Khan's Sikandar will release on March 30, a Sunday, breaking the usual Friday trend. Directed by AR Murugadoss, the film also stars Rashmika Mandanna and Kajal Aggarwal.

AR Murugadoss teases Sikandar's 'surprise element', compares it to Aamir's GhajiniDirector AR Murugadoss teases Sikandar's emotional core, comparing it to Ghajini. He hints at a surprise element in the Salman Khan-starrer, releasing on March 30.

SS Rajamouli treks solo at Odisha's highest peak, calls out public for litteringFilmmaker SS Rajamouli went on a solo trek on the Deomali trail, the highest peak in Odisha. He highlighted the littered trail and urged the citizens to carry back their waste.

Victoria Beckham's stunning wedding dress for Nicole Brydon Bloom unveiledVictoria Beckham crafted a custom lace wedding dress for Nicole Brydon Bloom, featuring hand-sewn floral details. The gown debuted at Bloom and Justin Theroux's beach wedding, showcasing Beckham's timeless design aesthetic.

Punisher returns in 'Daredevil: Born Again' for explosive showdownFrank Castle, aka the Punisher, returns in Daredevil: Born Again, sparking a tense confrontation with Matt Murdock amid an ongoing murder investigation. Meanwhile, new suspects emerge in White Tiger's death.

Why Heather Thomas left Hollywood: The stalker nightmare that drove her awayHeather Thomas left Hollywood after enduring stalkers, break-ins, and death threats. She revealed the harrowing experiences that forced her into hiding and the challenges women face in the entertainment industry.

Kelly Clarkson returns to talk show after two-week absence – Here's whyKelly Clarkson returned to The Kelly Clarkson Show after a two-week absence due to a personal issue. Guest hosts covered for her, and she is now preparing for her Las Vegas residency.

Severance Season 2 Finale: Release date, runtime & what to expectThe Severance Season 2 finale airs March 20 on Apple TV+. With its sci-fi corporate thriller concept and gripping plot, the show remains a fan favorite. Season 3 is already in development.

Kevin Hart becomes World's highest-paid comedian in 2024, earning $81 millionKevin Hart became the world's highest-paid comedian in 2024, earning $81 million. His diversified portfolio—including films, streaming series, stand-up, and endorsements—helped him surpass stars like Jerry Seinfeld, Tom Cruise, and Hugh Jackman.

Taylor Swift teases Reputation era? Fans decode snake necklace at iHeart Awards 2025Taylor Swift made a surprise virtual appearance at the iHeartRadio Music Awards 2025, sparking speculation about Reputation (Taylor's Version) after wearing a snake choker, a nod to her iconic 2017 album.

Mariah Carey and Anderson .Paak Dating? iHeartRadio Music awards appearance sparks rumoursMariah Carey and Anderson .Paak reignite dating rumours after attending the 2025 iHeartRadio Music Awards together. Meanwhile, Mariah's speech references her past with Tommy Mottola, sparking further discussion about her early career struggles.
John Wick Ballerina trailer: Ana de Armas faces off Keanu ReevesThe second trailer of the highly anticipated John Wick spin-off, Ballerina, is here. And it promises loads of action and thrill.

Esha Deol on link-up rumours with Ajay Devgn: That was so weirdEsha Deol discussed past link-up rumours, including those with Ajay Devgn. She said it was weird and said their bond was more about respect and admiration for each other.

general news.headline: UP woman who killed husband misled his family by sending texts posing as himThe Meerut woman, who allegedly killed her husband with the help of her lover, misled the family of the victim by sending texts from his phone posing as him. She sent Holi greetings to her husband's sister and also spoke to her regarding plans for the festival.

Indian student in US detained, faces deportation over alleged Hamas tiesThe Donald Trump administration has detained an Indian national and postdoctoral fellow, Badar Khan Suri, over allegations of spreading antisemitism and having ties to Hamas. Suri's plea said that he was being targeted because of his wife's Palestinian origins.

Woman strangled by friend, body tied to a rock, dumped in Delhi canalThe body of the woman, named Komal, was found in the Chhawla canal in Delhi's Seemapuri on March 17, five days since she went missing.

Elon Musk's AI bot Grok under Centre's scrutiny over use of Hindi slang: SourcesThe Information and Technology Ministry has expressed concerns with X over the use of such provocative language by Grok and will look into the factors leading to it.

Was OBC quota abused for Muslims? Bengal says will conduct fresh surveyThe West Bengal government told the Supreme Court it would conduct a fresh OBC survey in three weeks. Controversy erupted over the inclusion of several Muslim communities, with the High Court noting religion seemed the sole criterion. The Mamata Banerjee-led government now faces scrutiny over its next move.

Month-long plan, murder on camera: UP woman kills ex-lover with boyfriend's helpCCTV footage showed the accused on a motorcycle, chasing victim Diljit, who was on a scooter on the night of Holi. Rajkumar then opened fire and killed Diljit.

Conservationist behind PM Modi's Project Cheetah found dead in Saudi flatVincent van der Merwe was in charge of getting the cheetahs brought from South Africa and Namibia acclimatised to Indian conditions. Despite the challenges and legal barriers involved in re-introducing the African cheetahs to Kuno National Park, he also expressed strong faith in the project.

Elon Musk feels he rules the world. Is there a ketamine drug link?Tesla boss Elon Musk seems to be on a mission to conquer the world, and even Mars. But his odd-hour rants, alleged Nazi salute and chainsaw act have raised eyebrows. Some now wonder if this has to do with ketamine, which he takes for his depression treatment. This is what ketamine is, and what its overuse could lead to.

Israel begins ground assault in Gaza, captures key corridor: This is last warningGround operations in central and southern Gaza came a day after Israel launched aerial bombardment of the strip, reportedly killing over 400 people and shattering a two-month-old ceasefire deal with Hamas.

500-700 farmers detained in Punjab, bulldozers in Haryana to clear barricadesThe Punjab police detained the top leadership behind the farmer protests while uprooting the dharnas at both Shambhu and Khanauri border protest sites.

Cricketers have been banned from using saliva to maintain the shine of the ball since Covid-19 pandemic.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.
